subject: College Athletics
lead_paragraph: Boston University will leave the America East conference at the start of the 2013-14 academic year. The five-time N.C.A.A. champion hockey team will remain in Hockey East.
snippet: Boston University will leave the America East conference at the start of the 2013-14 academic year. The five-time N.C.A.A. champion hockey team will remain in Hockey East.
